name: Kinetic Leading Style Assessment
shortDescription: Discover how you lead entrepreneurial organizations

dimensions.name: Ecosystem Attitude
dimensions.description: How you deal with other stakeholders

quadrant1.name: Transformer
quadrant1.description: In leading entrepreneurial organisations, you tend to (1) focus on future value opportunities and long-term competitiveness; and (2) embed the organisation in the broader community of stakeholders. Your strength is in guiding the organization to develop new capabilities. You are keen to reach out across boundaries and work towards the common interests of the ecosystem.

quadrant2.name: Challenger
quadrant2.description: When facing new ideas or situations, you tend to (1) consider options based on identifying gaps and a sense of what is missing or what else is possible; and (2) deliberate action based on careful assessment of its merits and prospects. Your strength is in finding weakest links, areas for improvement, and immediate action steps. You are keen to close gaps, maintain a sense of movement, and define constant progress.

quadrant3.name: Troubleshooter
quadrant3.description: In leading entrepreneurial organisations, you tend to (1) focus on present value and near-term performance; and (2) consider the interests and competitive position of the organisation. Your strength is in energising the organisation to leverage existing capabilities. You are keen to define and enforce the specific strategic space in which the organisation operates.

quadrant4.name: Co-creator
quadrant4.description: In leading entrepreneurial organisations, you tend to (1) focus on present value and near-term performance; and (2) embed the organisation in the broader community of stakeholders. Your strength is in energizing the organisation to leverage existing capabilities. You are keen to reach out across boundaries and work towards the common interests of the ecosystem.

borderNorth.name: Kinetic within future (Challenger and Transformer)
borderNorth.description: In leading entrepreneurial organisations, you tend to focus on future value opportunities and long-term competitiveness. In positioning your organisation, you show flexibility between (1) considering its interests and competitive position, and (2) embedding it in the broader community of stakeholders. Your strength is in guiding the organisation to develop new capabilities. You are keen to define and enforce the specific strategic space in which the organisation operates, as well as to reach out across boundaries and work towards the common interests of the ecosystem.

borderSouth.name: Kinetic within present (Troubleshooter and Co-creator)
borderSouth.description: In leading entrepreneurial organisations, you tend to focus on present value and near-term performance. In positioning your organisation, you show flexibility between (1) considering its interests and competitive position, and (2) embedding it in the broader community of stakeholders. Your strength is in energising the organisation to leverage existing capabilities. You are keen to define and enforce the specific strategic space in which the organisation operates, as well as to reach out across boundaries and work towards the common interests of the ecosystem.

borderWest.name: Kinetic within transact (Troubleshooter and Challenger)
borderWest.description: In leading entrepreneurial organisations, you show flexibility in focusing on (1) present value and near-term performance and (2) future value opportunities and long-term competitiveness. You consider the interests and competitive position of the organisation. Your strength is in energising the organisation to leverage existing capabilities as well as guiding the organisation to develop new capabilities. You are keen to define and enforce the specific strategic space in which the organisation operates.

borderEast.name: Kinetic within collaborate (Playful and Breakaway)
borderEast.description: In leading entrepreneurial organisations, you show flexibility in focusing on (1) present value and near-term performance and (2) future value opportunities and long-term competitiveness. You embed the organisation in the broader community of stakeholders. Your strength is in energizing the organisation to leverage existing capabilities as well as guiding the organisation to develop new capabilities. You are keen to reach out across boundaries and work towards the common interests of the ecosystem.

center.name: Fully kinetic leader
center.description: In leading entrepreneurial organisations, you show flexibility in focusing on (1) present value and near-term performance and (2) future value opportunities and long-term competitiveness. In positioning your organisation, you show flexibility between (1) considering its interests and competitive position, and (2) embedding it in the broader community of stakeholders. You find strength and equal comfort in energising the organization to leverage existing capabilities as well as guiding the organisation to develop new capabilities. You are keen to define and enforce the specific strategic space in which the organisation operates, as well as to reach out across boundaries and work towards the common interests of the ecosystem.

homePage.title: Kinetic Leading Style Assessment
homePage.subtitle: Discover how you tend to lead entrepreneurial organizations. How do you respond when you need to move into new territories or ways of working?

assessmentDetails.heading: Assessment Details:
items: 12 randomized question pairs, in two parts
Remember: There are no right or wrong answers!

homePage.footer: Your privacy is important to us. All assessment data is securely processed and stored.

assessment.title: Kinetic Leading Style Assessment

partIntros.part1: When leading entrepreneurial organizations, how do you tend to set time horizons?
partIntros.part2: When leading entrepreneurial organizations, how do you tend to engage with the broader ecosystem?

assessment.instructions: Use the slider or click the bars above to select a response that reflects your hunch

metadata.description: Two-dimensional kinetic leading style assessment with 4 focused categories
